title: Champ Thresh restock on 11/12 for All-Star Event

replies.body: Sweet, I missed out the first time and I'm glad I don't have to try and get one off some scalper for 4 times the price. Just wondering if the {{champion:150}} figure will come back in stock?
Wait, I missed out the first one. Do you still get the Championship Thresh skin?

Why... Why didn't you let me know this before figure fest :( 
I just bought gnar and heimerdinger...
yesssss, i was so bummed when it went out of stock !!!!
